codes.AC01: Format of the account number specified is not correct
codes.AC04: Account number specified has been closed on the Receiver's books
codes.AC06: Account specified is blocked, prohibiting posting of transactions against it.
codes.AG01: Transaction forbidden on this type of account (formerly NoAgreement)
codes.AG02: Bank Operation code specified in the message is not valid for receiver
codes.AM02: Specific transaction/message amount is greater than allowed maximum
codes.AM03: Specified message amount is a non processable currency outside of existing agreement
codes.BE01: Identification of end customer is not consistent with associated account number. (formerly CreditorConsistency).
codes.BE04: Specification of creditor's address, which is required for payment, is missing/not correct (formerly IncorrectCreditorAddress).
codes.BE05: Party who initiated the message is not recognised by the end customer
codes.BE06: End customer specified is not known at associated Sort/National Bank Code or does no longer exist in the books
codes.BE07: Specification of debtor's address, which is required for payment, is missing/not correct.
codes.MD02: Mandate related information data required by the scheme is missing.
codes.MD08: Receiving agent does not offer specified Mandate services
codes.MD09: Account is not open to specified Mandates services
codes.MD10: Account is not open to specified Mandates services for this particular creditor
codes.MD11: Agent to whom the message needs to be forwarded cannot be located
codes.MD12: Mandate identification is not unique to the creditor
codes.MD13: There is a problem with the customer authentication
codes.MD14: Agent in the payment workflow is incorrect
codes.MD15: Currency of the transaction is incorrect
codes.MD18: Cancellation/amendment requested by the creditor and the debtor
codes.MD19: Mandate cancellation following early reimbursement of the debit by the debtor
codes.MD21: Mandate cancellation due to suspected fraud
codes.MD22: Mandate cancellation following mandate initiation cancellation
codes.MD23: Mandate cancellation following mandate amendment cancellation
codes.MS02: Reason has not been specified by end customer
codes.MS03: Reason has not been specified by agent.
codes.NARR: Reason is provided as narrative information in the additional reason information.
codes.RC01: Bank Identifier code specified in the message has an incorrect format (formerly IncorrectFormatForRoutingCode).
codes.RF01: Transaction reference is not unique within the message.
codes.RR01: Specification of the debtor’s account or unique identification needed for reasons of regulatory requirements is insufficient or missing
codes.RR02: Specification of the debtor’s name and/or address needed for regulatory requirements is insufficient or missing.
codes.RR03: Specification of the creditor’s name and/or address needed for regulatory requirements is insufficient or missing.
codes.SL01: Due to specific service offered by the Debtor Agent
codes.SL11: Whitelisting service offered by the Debtor Agent; Debtor has not included the Creditor on its “Whitelist” (yet). In the Whitelist the Debtor may list all allowed Creditors to debit Debtor bank account.
codes.SL12: Blacklisting service offered by the Debtor Agent; Debtor included the Creditor on his “Blacklist”. In the Blacklist the Debtor may list all Creditors not allowed to debit Debtor bank account.
codes.SL13: Due to Maximum allowed Direct Debit Transactions per period service offered by the Debtor Agent.
codes.SL14: Due to Maximum allowed Direct Debit Transaction amount service offered by the Debtor Agent.

description: Specifies the external mandate processing reason code in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
name: ExternalMandateReason1Code
